name: Sela
appearance: Lean and quick with cropped sea-black hair and wind-cut eyes. Smells of fog oil and eel-smoke; wears a stormglass lens on a bone cord.
character: Brash, superstitious about wind omens, but deadly precise when the mist rolls in.
skills: Fog prediction by taste and temperature
Signal rhythms with lanterns and horns
talents: Whistling tones that carry through fog
dreams: Chart the ghost routes the Lantern hides
Win veto rights for the Conclave in storm season
Teach a new generation to read fog by breath alone
secrets: Keeps a darksetting that reveals a Ferryman path, but fears its price
Feeds the Wardens misdirections when Parliament squeezes tolls too hard
Lies awake hearing the Skyhook hum out of season
